DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : Implement Patient Aligned Care Team ( PACT ) model identifies proactively manages Veterans high risk hospital admission death still ambulatory care set . Goal : - Reduce emergency department urgent care utilization , hospitalization , mortality complex , high risk patient - Improve Veteran staff satisfaction Objectives : - Maintain patient home set much possible - Secure appropriate home environment facilitate health well-being - Utilize comprehensive team-based care - Engage appropriate Veteran Health Administration ( VHA ) program provide interdisciplinary , coordinate , timely management complex medical issue
DOC.brief_title: Patient Aligned Care Team ( PACT ) Intensive Management ( PIM ) Project
